EmailTemplate.description: Email Template used when requesting a Tracking Number for a delivery.
EmailTemplate.name: Request TrackingNumber
EmailTemplate.subject: Tracking Number Request ({!Case.Subject})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Can you please provide a tracking number or Bill of Lading for delivery number:
For questions please contact {!Case.OwnerFullName} and reference case number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thanks!
